Events that occurred on 21 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 137a.
1995 – Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 5 is published.
2010 – Middle-earth Minstrel is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:

Thráin sets out for the Lonely Mountain.

New Moon[1]
